game.name: Fishing Mega-Game
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 캡션 이용 가능, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Fishing Mega-Game takes the joy of a fishing mini-game and crafts it into a larger creature collecting experience. Roam the land for new fishing spots and deploy your favorite fish in search for new playable fish!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fishing Mega-Game takes the joy of a fishing mini-game and crafts it into a larger creature collecting experience. Roam the land for new fishing spots and deploy your favorite fish in search for new playable fish!
